key_risks: Reliance on government contracts in politically unstable regions
Competitive pressures from alternative water supply solutions
controversies: High energy consumption and brine discharge concerns
environmental_issues: Potential harm to marine ecosystems from brine discharge
social_issues: Dependence on regions vulnerable to economic downturns and natural disasters
governance_issues: Regulatory dependencies and potential political instability in core markets
